Examples.Data: from Door import Door treedoor = Door() treedoor.close()

from Door import Door from Alarm import Alarm user = input('IDENTIFY YOURSELF') print 'Hello, ' +user exit = Door() siren = Alarm() if user == 'Ari': print 'Access granted' else: print 'Access denied' exit.close() siren.enable()
